body: Unless I'm mistaken, the title is something like: "The younger sister of my childhood friend?"
"幼馴染" means childhood friend, and "妹" means little sister.

He's in love with his sister or his childhood friend and since they ended up together his affection switch to her daughter as she's the reflecting image w/ the same personality as her?
Did the daughter really just saw her parents having sex in broad daylight? thus she got curious and offered her virginity to guy.
